educations: ?.educationalHistory | $map({title: .degree, school: .schoolName, date_start: .start, date_end: .end, description: null, location: {text: null, lat: null, lng: null}})
tags: $merge([{name: 'textResumeID', value: ?.identity?.textResumeID}, {name: 'resumeTitle', value: ?.resumeTitle}, {name: 'targetJobTitle', value: ?.targetJobTitle}, {name: 'highestEducationDegree', value: ?.highestEducationDegree}, {name: 'veteran', value: ?.veteran}, {name: 'lastActive', value: ?.lastActive}, {name: 'willRelocate', value: ?.location?.willRelocate}, {name: 'willTravel', value: ?.willTravel}, {name: 'relevanceScore', value: ?.relevance?.score}, {name: 'securityClearance', value: ?.securityClearance?.clearance}, {name: 'source', value: ?.source}], ?.location?.workAuthorizations | $map({name: 'workAuthorization', value: .authorization}), ?.boards | $map({name: 'board', value: .name}))
